headline: Brazil retailer Americanas taps operating chief Soares as new CEO
summary: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -Brazilian retailer Americanas announced on Monday that its board had approved Fernando Dias Soares as the company's new Chief Executive Officer starting in October, according to a securities filing.  Soares is a former executive for Anheuser-Busch InBev and Domino's Pizza who joined Americanas in 2024 as Chief Operating Officer.  He will replace Leonardo Coelho, who will join Americanas' finance committee, the firm said in the filing.

headline: Domino's® Best Deal Ever Offer Has Returned!
summary: Domino's Pizza Inc. (Nasdaq: DPZ) is turning up the heat as summer winds down with the return of its "Best Deal Ever" promotion. For a limited time, starting on Aug. 25, customers can devour any pizza with any toppings for $9.99 each.

headline: My 3 Favorite Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Perhaps it's time to start looking for names that are a bit off the beaten path and undervalued for all the wrong reasons.
